metadata.name: Série 2 - n°1
metadata.description:
“Heures d’a-temps", Série 2 -  n°01 , 2022
 

Digital replica of a physical garment and choreographic sequences composed by Céline Shen. 
They were exhibited at Centrale for Contemporary Art in Brussels, during the ISAC festival in 2018. 
Advanced technology is combined with poetic digital art in motion. 
 

The purchase of the digital piece is accompanied by a unique photographic print with a certificate of authenticity.  
 
__
 
Céline Shen is a French artist. 
Educated in Paris, she studied Philosophy at the Sorbonne University.
Her passion for fashion and dance led her to train as a clothing designer at the Ecole Nationale des Arts Décoratifs in Paris and at the same time study Choreography at the Académie Royale des Beaux-Arts in Brussels.
 
In between art and fashion, her creations are at the crossroads of several disciplines : digital arts, photography, performance, installation, video and choreography.

Winner of the “Design Revelation” from the ADAGP in 2019, she was also
